short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ghost Traffic is a browser extension that allows you to view the traffic of any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is a great tool for web developers, SEO experts, and anyone who wants to see how a website is performing based on the country you live in.

Understand how your website is performing and how it compares to your competitors based on organic monthly traffic, visibility, paid traffic cost and organic keywords.

Get a overview of the traffic of any website and see how it has changed over time. Learn how many keywords a website ranks for, and which place it has in the search results.

**New**. Join the Discord for exclusive sneak peeks and to voice your opinions on potential future features to be implemented: https://discord.gg/FvSZ5GrF
